subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Wood boxes

Werent your early boxes wood? Is there any reason your doing these boxex in wood?
   
  Kay

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
      .hmmessage P  {  margin:0px;  padding:0px  }  body.hmmessage  {  FONT-SIZE: 10pt;  FONT-FAMILY:Tahoma  }     I bought two wood boxes at Hobby Lobby Saturday. Of course the front panel is proving to be a challenge, I wanted it wood too, so I'm using 1/8 inch mahogany plywood--ever try to drill speaker gril holes without splintering the wood!? I don't know why they wood(pun intended) say it's on time.  I like this kind of voice, the profoundness is in the simplicity. 
 
 Frank-S
